tab1.text1: Thank you for joining this server! You can join our discord by clicking the Discord button below!

tab2.text1:
- Do not build on  KO/Bed and similar ratholes
- Building to restrict usage of drops or resource areas is NOT allowed
- Meshing, Exploiting, Tunneling, Duping is NOT allowed
- OB Building is NNOT allowed (Blue Ob Allowed)
- Caging is allowed only 3H
tab2.text2:
- Admin Panel
